title: Data Type Checker
description: Create a program that takes in a user's input and determines the data type of the input. The program should be able to differentiate between integers, floats, and strings. If the input is an integer or a float, the program should print out the value and its corresponding data type. If the input is a string, the program should print out the string and its length.
sample_output: The input '123' is of type integer.
